Dead by Daylight is a very interesting game with a very uneven sense of balance, often times wondering whether that's fair or not.

And you see, that's the beauty of Dead by Daylight. Because no matter how many times you get ruined by a bug exploiting survive with friends group, you'll always fondly remember the times you got a 4k on the next group who didn't stand a chance.


If you have anger issues, problems working with others, empathetic tendencies, or just general will to live, find another game.

Horribly unbalanced toward killers, this game is almost unplayable. Even when playable (because you got lucky and have a bad killer), it is no fun to play survivors due to the constant buffing of killers that the devs have made with every update. The result is a mess that I wholeheartedly do not recommend.

First 20 hours ,

It was great , really great , it made my palm sweat, my heart pumping like it gonna jump out. Each time you lose, you got killed , you play again.

Second 20 hours,

Now I start to learn , how to evade, how to get skill check right, how to hide, how to cooperate with others. The game still scare the shits out of you, you still screaming or shouting when the killer saw you, chase you down and hang you up.

Third 20 hours,

I get the hang of it, able to escape couple of times. Just have to deal with toxic community, but fortunately you will still meet up some good guys.

Now its the sale, so with 50% discounted price, first 60 hours of gameplay is guaranteed worth the price, what you waiting for ? my hours still counting.

Отличная игра!
Изначально отноился к ней с некоторой долей скептицизма, и уж тем более сомневался после внутриигрового туториала, в котором лагали персонажи из-за пинга. Но сразу же, после нескольких минут я сразу же изменил свое мнение.
Атмосфера и адреналин тут буквально на каждом шагу. Действительно страшно прятаться выжившим от убийцы.
Самый лучший вариант, прятаться в траве и ни в коем случае не бегать, потому что от спринта на земле остается рваная красная дорожка, видимая только убийцей и являющаяся для него ориентиром.
К слову об убийцах. Их тут не так уж и много, но зато каждый из них уникальный.
Excelente juego.

Muito bom

Opravdu skvělá hra, která dokáže pobavit na spoustu času jak za Survivory, tak za Killery. Ovšem, všechno má své háčky... například (v mém případě) většina hráčů => ať jsem hrál za Killera jakkoliv... vždycky se objevil někdo, kdo mě po hře začal urážet (ze začátku to jde ignorovat, ale po čase to začne být otravné, až někdy i trapné). Ze strany Survivorů nevidím žádný vážný problém, jen občas jsou lidi trochu sobečtí a na háku vás nechají zemřít... ale co, o tomto tato hra je, ať se vám to líbí nebo ne. Vaším úkolem je přežít a ne za každou cenu někoho zachránit a během procesu se (nejčastěji) nechat chytit, a pak NADÁVAT chudákům za to, že vás NENECHAL UTÉCT. Stejně jako úkol Survivorů je utéct, je Killerův úkol všechny chytit jakkoliv se mu zachce a ne podle nějakých hloupých nepsaných pravidel.
Tato hra také nabízí řadu DLC, ale bohužel za docela velké peníze vzhledem k tomu, co všechno každé jedno z nich nabízí, ALE NAŠTĚSTÍ máme ve hře i postavy, které můžeme koupit za herní měnu, kterou dostáváme za každý lvl-up našeho in-game profilu. 
-Snad se vám moje recenze bude hodit při zamýšlení o zakoupení této hry. 

Díky, že jste se zastavili a přečetli mou recenzi. :p
dead by buglight
Nice 👌

As a hardcore fan and player of Dead by Daylight I highly recommend this game however I'll be taking in the Pros and Cons for this review

Pros: 
-Constantly being updated to improve gameplay
-New content frequently
-Licensed Killers
-Very fun to play with friends and sometimes community members.
-Implementing story lines and some lore to go with the game.
-Have events to earn extra rewards.
-Challenges such as TOMES and Achievements.
Cons:
-Not every killer is free but you can buy them with in game currency you can obtain (Besides licensed killers)
-Gameplay can get repetitive after awhile.
-Community is usually toxic (But I mean what games don't have toxic players you'll find em everywhere tbh)
-Bugs and glitches and lag can interfere with a match heavily but devs look into that and are trying to improve stability.

Overall:
I love Dead by Daylight as a game it does yes have it's problems at times but that aside the gameplay for me is always refreshing and the thrill of a new match and events and not to mention new challenges and achievements and content keep me going.

This game have a good potential, 4 survivors and 1 killer, the survivors have to start some generator to open the door to escape and the killer have to hook them on a hook to kill them. But there is one thing that why I don't recommend this game...THE COMMUNITY !!! When you play survivor, the killer will camp you, or only focus you (tunel), bodyblock ect... And when you play killer...omg, the most of the survivor will troll you, blodyblock to not hock other survivor that you got, they will Tbag you when they are at the door at one millimeter to escape ect... Seriously the community ruin the game. Ow and there is a lot of smurf (yep there is a rank in the game) and btw the half of the killer are bad and the other half are OP AF! So if you will play only with friends, go and get it right now, but if you will play alone or with friend but with an unknow player as the killer, well I warned you.

Dead by Daylight is a 4 vs 1 survival horror game featuring such cult classics like Leatherface, and Michael Myres. Objectively a fun and interesting take on the genre of game, it is better to play with friends. Many of the issues with the game lie with the player base quitting early or committing to scummy practices to farm points
